name: raylib-pointers
description: The idea here is that this is raylib, but all structs are pointers, and all struct-returns are moved to the first paramater of the function.

scripts.build: npm run generate && cmake -B build && cmake --build build
scripts.build:wasm1: docker run -it --rm -v $(pwd):/cart konsumer/null0 clang  --sysroot=/opt/wasi-sdk/share/wasi-sysroot/ --target=wasm32 -nostdlib -Wl,--allow-undefined -Wl,--export-all -Wl,--no-entry -o game.wasm src/test-wasm1.c

author: konsumer
